import React, { useState ,useEffect} from 'react' import './signup.css' const SignUp = () => { const localStorage1 = () => { const LData = localStorage.getItem('Data') // var PData = JSON.parse(LData) if(LData){ return(JSON.parse(LData)) }else{ return [] } console.log(LData) } const [allEntry,setAllEntry] = useState(localStorage1) const [fname,setFname] = useState('') const [lname,setLname] = useState('') const btnClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(fname){ const myData = { fname:fname, lname:lname } setAllEntry([...allEntry,myData]) } } useEffect(() => { localStorage.setItem("Data",JSON.stringify(allEntry)) }, [allEntry]) return ( <>

Registration Form

setFname(e.target.value)} value={fname}/>
setLname(e.target.value)} value={lname}/>
{/*
*/} {/*

) } export default SignUp
